snippet: As the Syrian civil war rages, scores of Syrian casualties have been discreetly spirited across the hostile frontier for lifesaving treatment in Israel, an enemy country.
abstract: Scores of Syrian casualties from country's civil war are being discreetly spirited across hostile frontier for lifesaving treatment in Israel, an enemy country; Israeli authorities have sanctioned this small, low-profile humanitarian response to tragedy taking place in Syria, balancing decades of hostility with demands of proximity and neighborliness.
lead_paragraph: As the Syrian civil war rages, scores of Syrian casualties have been discreetly spirited across the hostile frontier for lifesaving treatment in Israel, an enemy country.

headline.main: Across Forbidden Border, Doctors in Israel Quietly Tend to Syria’s Wounded
headline.print_headline: Across Forbidden Border, Doctors in Israel Quietly Tend to Syria’s Wounded

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
keywords.name: subject
